title: Senior Financial Analyst
description: About Us DataCamp is on a mission to make the world data fluent by building the future of data education We help both businesses and individuals to upskill reskill and transition from learning to doing data science through our training certification and collaboration tools Today we have 400 interactive courses 270 expert instructors 90 reallife projects and we consistently upgrade our learning products and services to continuously deliver value to consumer teams and enterprise customers Since our launch in 2013 more than 11 million learners around the world have completed hundreds of millions of DataCamp content items More than 3500 businesses and government entities worldwide use DataCamp to make their teams and organisations data fluent Funded by Spectrum Equity Accomplice and Arthur Ventures our ambition is to grow to 100M ARR in the next few years Headquartered in NY we have offices in London and Leuven with about 200 colleagues working together out of our major hubs or remotely Please visit here for more information about our Hiring Process About the Role The Finance team is seeking a Sr Financial Analyst to join our growing team You will be the finance business partner to key functional leaders across our B2C and B2B commercial organizations responsible for identifying analyzing and reporting on metrics that reflect business performance and driving a rigorous budgeting and forecasting process You will work with both finance and business leaders to ensure timely and accurate forecasting calculations This is a highly visible role with frequent interactions across the leadership team This would be a great opportunity for anyone wanting to get a 360 view of all finance processes in an international and fast growing SaaSEdTech company and wanting to build out the foundation of a best in class FPA and strategic finance function The role reports to the Finance Manager You will interact frequently with other teams in the US UK and Belgium What Youll Do Build and maintain financial models used for monthly quarterly and annual forecast and budget review cycles Become the absolute expert on all B2B and B2C financial metrics and unit economics of our business Analyze variances between actuals and forecasts use insights to drive meaningful action and communicate complex issues clearly and concisely Buildexpand financial and operational reporting capabilities that provide key business insights and help drive business decisions with an ROI mindset Collaborate with the data team to build and maintain relevant dashboards and improve our reporting and forecasting capabilities on key SaaS metrics Participate in new FPA initiatives including ad hoc analysis and process improvement Conduct strategic financial analysis pricing  packaging ROI of paid marketing spend etc to inform some of our most critical business decisions What Youll Bring Bachelors degree in Accounting Finance or a businessrelated field required 4 years of experience in accounting financial and analytical roles preferably a combination of investment banking or PEVC experience plus FPA experience SaaS experience or knowledge applicable key metrics ARR MRR CAC Churn LTV Pipeline Advanced knowledge of Google Suite Sheets Slides and Microsoft Office Excel Interpersonal and communication skills and ability to work closely with all levels of management Detail oriented analytical and structured Desire to learn quickly and discover new functionalities to improve your work on a continuous basis Excellent problemsolving skills Knowledge of NetSuite Salesforce data visualizationBI tools and subscription management tools is a plus Bonus points for Python and SQL skills Ability to work in a fast paced and 100 English speaking environment Whats in it for you In addition to joining a creative and international startup as a permanent employee youll enjoy A very competitive salary and stock options An exciting job that will offer you technical challenges every day Flexible working hours International company retreats Conference and hardware budget Working with a great team everyone says this but were seriouswere pretty great DataCamp is an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

title: Loan Advisor
description: Since our founding in 2015 Knock has been on a mission to make the often stressful process of buying and selling homes simple certain and convenient Today we are an innovative home finance company that leverages technology and our relationships with more th an 120000 real estate agents throughout the US to help homeowners repurpose some of their equity to buy their dream home before they sell avoiding the hassle of living through repairs and showings Its all made possible by our flagship HomeSwap product which combines a traditional mortgage with a nointerest bridge loan that empowers consumers with a noncontingent cashlike offer right on their phone Launched by founding team members of Truliacom Knock currently operates in 75 markets nationwide Knock has raised 900 million in debt and equity from toptier investors including Foundry Group Greycroft RRE Parker89 and The National Association of Realtors  giving NARs 16 million members the ability to market Knocks homeownership solutions to their clients For more information visit knockcom Enjoying Life  Making an Impact Since our founding in 2015 Knock has and continues to offer a 100 remote work culture 100 employee covered medical dental  vision premiums for full time employees Flexible Paid Time Off for full time employees Paid parental leave for all full time employees 12 weeks paid parental leave for the birthing mother 6 weeks paid parental leave for the nonbirthing parent 1000 annually for professional development Life ADD and Disability insurance for full time employees 401K noncontributory by Knock for all employees 75 monthly allowance for health  wellness Up to 400 monthly for a coworking space for eligible employees 100 monthly allowance for home internet mobile phone or other communication devices 2500 referral bonus for eligible employees We are seeking a Knockstar who is an experienced Mortgage Loan Advisor to join our team As a Loan Advisor you will manage and originate a portfolio of selfgenerated referral and inside mortgage loans proactively identify develop and maintain a quality network of business relationships that serves as a source of referrals for new mortgage lending opportunities Deliver excellent customer service resulting in positive reviews for Knock and future business opportunities or referrals from clients and referral partners Advise Knock customers of appropriate products terms and pricing while gathering any additional required information Partner with Loan Processing and other crossfunctional stakeholders to provide an experience that delights customers and referral partners alike and leads to ontime closings Manage and originate a portfolio of selfgenerated referral and inside mortgage loans ensuring compliance with federal and state regulations as well as company processes and procedures Proactively identify develop and maintain a quality network of business relationships that serves as a source of referrals for new mortgage lending opportunities Promote a culture that puts People First with an emphasis on bestinclass customer service Continually learn grow and expand your knowledge while also supporting others learning act as a mentor and be a resource for others inside and outside of your team Maintain required NMLS and State Licensing in states where Knock is licensed to originate mortgage loans including any required continuing education Take on adhoc projects as they arise  always be willing to support your team where they need you Qualifications  Youll Bring 3 years experience as a licensed Mortgage Loan Originator with an emphasis on purchase loans You are comfortable with change and working in a fastpaced startup environment You are a team player and a fantastic communicator  naturally inclined to deliver amazing customer service Proficiency in FNMA and FHLMC guidelines  familiarity with nonconforming jumbo a plus Experience using Encompass Optimal Blue Customer Relationship Management Systems SalesForce Zoom and the Google Suite of products Proven success working 100 remote in prior positions  are experience working with a distributed national team driven to excel and easily able to independently operate with little to no supervision We encourage you to apply even if you dont meet every listed requirement Physical Requirements Set up and constantly operate a computer Communicate and exchange accurate information to others via telephone or internet video applications The candidate must be able to perform the essential functions of the job with or without reasonable accommodation Our Compensation Philosophy As a fully remote USbased workforce our goal is to ensure that all Knockstars are fairly compensated Please note that the salary range information that follows is a good faith estimate for this position provided pursuant to the Colorado Equal Pay for Equal Work Act for Colorado applicants The salary range estimate for this position is 6000000 USD  incentive program bonus The actual offer reflecting the total compensation package  benefits will be at the companys sole discretion and determined by factors including but not limited to years of experience job level geographic location and other relevant business considerations The company also reserves the right to amend or modify this job description employee perks and benefits at any time Employees eligible for bonus andor commission will be provided details in the offer letter We are proud to be a remote distributed company with employees across 40 states and counting This is an amazing opportunity to be an integral part of building a multibillion dollar consumer brand in an industry that is long overdue for a new way of doing things You will be working with a passionate team that is disrupting the status quo Knock and its subsidiaries are committed to creating a diverse inclusive and equitable environment and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin genetics disability age or veteran status Please no recruitment firm or agency inquiries you will not receive a reply from us This position is in the continental United States PDF is our preferred format for resumes and any other attachments Thank you LIRemote

title: Senior AI Product Manager
description: The SeniorPrincipal AI Product Manager will be responsible for identifying defining prioritizing and executing initiatives that facilitate the implementation of AI across internal processes throughout the organization Your intention will be to enable our internal team members to be more efficient and effective in their jobs Youll work with every function in the company to find ways to improve workflows using AI and ML You will work handinhand with engineering and design to implement worldclass solutions You will be an evangelist for AI and will motivate and inspire the organization to embrace the benefits of AI You will also be a consultant for product teams to help ideate and refine AIpowered functionality for our products You will be an expert who has a deep understanding of a wide spectrum of AI technologies and can quickly identify optimal solutions This position will report to the head of product management and will be a hybrid role requiring an average of 3 days inoffice and 2 flex days per week What You Will Own  Responsibilities Develop and execute the strategic vision for internal AIML initiatives aligning with the companys overall goals and objectives Create and maintain a comprehensive product roadmap for internal AIML projects incorporating business needs solution availability and viability emerging trends and ROI Collaborate with crossfunctional teams including engineering and design to define requirements and specifications based on user needs and business priorities Prioritize and manage a backlog of AIML opportunities considering technical feasibility market impact and resource allocation Engage with internal and external stakeholders including executives customers and partners to gather feedback communicate updates and ensure alignment with business goals Conduct competitive analysis and market research to identify trends opportunities and emerging technologies informing our strategy and priorities Collaborate with product designers to ensure seamless and intuitive user experiences with AIML products leveraging user feedback and usability testing Define and track key performance indicators KPIs for AIML projects Monitor their performance and conduct datadriven analyses to identify areas for improvement and optimization Coordinate the release and launch of AIML projects working closely with engineering and customer success teams to ensure smooth deployment and customer adoption You will be the subject matter expert for AIML evangelizing its value proposition internally and externally through demos case studies presentations and participation in industry events Identify and communicate potential risks and challenges associated with AIML proactively developing mitigation strategies to minimize their impact Stay updated with relevant regulations and guidelines related to AIML technologies ensuring that the products adhere to legal and ethical standards Stay abreast of advancements in AIML technologies and methodologies proactively identifying opportunities to enhance the products and drive innovation What You Will Need to Accomplish the Job minimum qualifications Bachelors or masters degree or equivalent work experience in a relevant field such as computer science data science engineering or a related discipline A higher degree or certification in AIML is a plus Extensive professional experience in product management specifically in AIML or related areas Ideally 5 years of experience in product management roles with a focus on AIML products andor services Strong understanding of artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts and technologies Familiarity with popular AIML frameworks and tools and ability to apply them to product development and decisionmaking Prior experience working in a SaaS Software as a Service company is highly desirable Understanding the SaaS business model customer needs and market dynamics Demonstrated expertise in product management methodologies and practices including market research product strategy development roadmap planning feature prioritization and agile product development Proficiency in technical aspects related to AIML such as data engineering data science cloud computing and software development Ability to work closely with engineering teams and understand technical complexities Strong leadership skills with experience in leading crossfunctional teams or projects and driving product initiatives Proven ability to collaborate effectively with engineers data scientists designers and other stakeholders Ability to think strategically and align AIML product vision with overall business goals Strong analytical business financial and problemsolving skills to make datadriven decisions and prioritize product features Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively convey complex AIML concepts to both technical and nontechnical audiences Ability to present ideas influence stakeholders and advocate for the product internally and externally Deep understanding of customer needs and the ability to translate them into actionable product requirements Experience with usercentric design thinking and conducting user research Familiarity with the industry landscape emerging trends and competitive landscape in the AIML space Stay updated with advancements in AIML technologies and their potential impact on product strategy Willingness to learn and adapt in a rapidly evolving AIML landscape Proactive in seeking new knowledge attending conferences participating in industry forums and continuously improving skills Ability to stay highly organized and effectively manage multiple highpriority initiatives across multiple teams Oriented toward action and shipping valuable software updates frequently What Will Make Us Love You preferred qualifications including personality traits Experience working in the healthcare industry is highly desirable Understanding the competitive space and opportunities are essential Track record of frequent delivery of highquality AIML product features or projects Deep knowledge of and fascination with current AI landscape and developments Highly collaborative and great at motivating others Ability to be an evangelist and inspire people to think in new ways Weave is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion We welcome anyone who is hungry to learn problemsolve and progress regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability gender identity veteran status or other applicable legally protected characteristics If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation please let us know

unstructured to help make clear recommendations that will help us optimize our business and expand into new markets Reports to Director of Strategy Timeline There are 2 separate timelines for this customer transactions Bootstrapped until 2020 Recharge is valued at over 21B dollars and is a double unicorn with a total raise of 277M dollars Join us as we work with our merchants to define the robust directory service design Experience in an iterative approach to back office support combined with the goal of adapting quickly and thinking big Excellent organizational verbal and written title: Controller
description: ABOUT US OLIPOP was founded in 2017 by Ben Goodwin and David Lester Ben and David have been working together for nearly a decade to find accessible solutions to bring the benefits of digestive health to as many consumers as possible OLIPOP is a deliciously refreshing tonic that is crafted with prebiotics botanicals and natural plant fiber to support your microbiome and benefit digestive health Were on a mission to provide an affordable delicious alternative to soda that delivers leadingedge health benefits to mainstream consumers OUR TEAM At Olipop our values lead the way we create our products engage with each other and interact with our community While were invested in our product were equally invested in personal development Were tightly knit were genuine and were always pushing the envelope to do a better job than we did the day before Our team is also fully remote requiring us to be resourceful creative and collaborative to support our fastmoving business To best serve our diverse community of customers we also seek to recruit and include people with a diversity of abilities backgrounds and cultures WHAT YOULL NEED Working at a startup can be as much a personal journey as it is a professional one To succeed at a company like Olipop you must be comfortable with failing learning and adapting You need to be curious optimistic and able to find a way when it seems impossible You must be confident enough to express your ideas but humble and open to learning from your experiences and from others If this is the approach you take to life then wed love to hear from you ABOUT THIS ROLE The Controller is responsible for managing the companys accounting activities including consolidated financial statements budgets forecasts monthend and yearend closings bankcredit line reporting as well as internal and external audits and tax reporting This individual will work directly with the CFO and management team to provide leadership strategies create financial reports provide strategic financial guidance and analysis as well as help the company achieve business goals RESPONSIBILITIES Oversee the accounting department while providing key financial information and reports to senior leadership on company activities Manage financial data for areas of responsibility to ensure data integrity and accuracy through development and documentation of procedures database management and presenting suggestions for improvement as appropriate Oversee accounting procedures and internal controls implement monitor enhance Participate in the month end close cycle by executing and coordinating activities of staff to produce timely financial statements analyses and reconciliations This includes supervision andor preparation of monthly journal entries reconciliations and any other analysis as determined from time to time as well as managementcompletion of interim deliverables as determined by the month end close calendar Prepare schedules and provide requested data for audits by accessing appropriate information and support to make sure the audit is completed successfully and timely Consult on sound management of Company assets Generate standard and ad hoc financial reports by gathering and analyzing information from the general ledger and other company systems developing recommendations and reporting to management Analyze variances interpret data and develop projections using appropriate tools and methodologies to assist management in meeting established goals Collaborate with internal and external auditors to lead the annual audit process Collaborate with the FPA team to develop insights and improvements to business performance Develop process improvements and procedures with the CFO on business ricks and performance QUALIFICATIONS Bachelors Degree in Accounting or Finance CPA or MBA preferred Strong understanding of GAAP FASB accrual basis accounting audit fixed asset accounting and tax filing requirements 10 years of experience in Accounting ideally in CPG or FB industry Strong knowledge of US GAAP Proficient in Microsoft Excel  google suite Strong written and verbal communication skills MA experience preferred Exceptional attention to detail Prior experience with NetSuite  Anaplan strongly preferred COMPENSATION 175000 base salary We are proud to be an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action Employer Olipop does not discriminate on the basis of race color religion sex including pregnancy and gender identity national origin political affiliation sexual orientation marital status disability genetic information age membership in an employee organization retaliation parental status military service or other nonmerit factor Applicants and employees are protected from discrimination under Federal law For more information please see EEO is the Law

title: Product Marketing Manager
description: Who we are Path is a healthtech company dedicated to making mental health care work for everyone Path takes a patientfirst approach where treatment is more accessible personalized and effective With Path its easy to find a highquality therapist or psychiatric clinician who accepts insurance and is actively accepting new patients What were solving Over 65 million Americans have a treatable mental health issue  thats 1 in 5 people Today its difficult to find a provider and for those with complicated conditions its nearly impossible to find coordinated care Were here to fix this Our Mission Paths mission is to make mental healthcare work for everyone About The Role Path is seeking a dynamic Product Marketing Manager to join our small but growing PMM team This role represents an incredible opportunity to serve as a dedicated product marketer focused on our licensed provider audience Your efforts will help to inform the product we build Paths market positioning and our gotomarket strategy enabling the team to continuously add excellent therapists to Paths national network In this role you will sit at the intersection of product marketing and sales You will develop a deep understanding of what matters most to licensed therapists craft compelling messaging that positions Path as an excellent place to practice and equipenable our internal teams as they work to acquire and retain these therapists over the long term Were a growing marketing team and are equally interested in your past experience and your growth potential Come build with us You Will Generate assets for use on the Path website and throughout our lifecycle journey and sales funnel Execute new feature launches and drive adoption of therapist portal functionality Develop and deploy a provider voice of the customer initiative collecting insights from internal teams sales activation support and the therapists themselves NPS interviews Own development of validated provider claims testimonials and other relevant social proof Aid in the training and enablement of our sales teams Continually develop and iterate on therapist messaging guide and value propositions You Bring MustHaves 23 years of experience in a B2B product marketing role Excellent written and verbal communication skills and a passion for crafting effective copy Proven track record of conceptualizing strategizing and shipping marketing and sales assets Experience executing on product launches and driving feature adoption Ability to set context and synthesize what matters to target audiences Experience effectively translating complex product details into easily understood resources and assets An experimental mindset you thrive in an exploratory test  learn environment Experience conducting competitive analysis and maintaining a competitive asset library Ability to effectively manage crossfunctional relationships in a central facilitating role Preferred Experience in healthcare andor marketplace business models with a contract workforce Experience developing sales training materials and facilitating live sessions Experience drivingcontributing to an audience segmentation  personas project Our Team The people of Path are what truly define our mission and determine our impact on the world We believe in building not only a team but a diverse community that thrives by helping each other succeed and grow and inspiring each other by taking on big challenges For employees Path is a 100 remote healthtech company and were HIRING Were excited to bring people onto the team who are committed to raising the bar on mental health care As Part Of Our Team FullTime Employees Receive The ability to work from any location within the US Competitive pay and benefits that do not change based on location 2 companywide shutdown weeks each year to focus on selfcare Paid parental leave to support you and your family Medical dental and vision insurance through our employer plan Access to our 401K Access to an Employer Assistance Plan EAP through our insurance plan The equipment you need to ensure your home office sets you up for success

title: Director, Ecosystem Marketing
description: Who we are Recharge is the leader in powering physical subscriptions making it one of the most important ecommerce engines Recharge powers over 50M subscriptions worldwide and has processed more than 10B in transactions More than 15K brands such as Verve Coffee Roasters Bokksu Who Gives A Crap Billie and Bite Toothpaste Bits rely on Recharge daily to grow their businesses and delight their customers Recharges mission is to enable brands and merchants to form strong lasting relationships with their customers through recurring purchases As merchants seek ways to drive more direct sales and distribution through their channels and move away from a reliance on traditional online marketing strategies Recharge has made it possible to grow businesses with seamless recurring customer transactions Bootstrapped until 2020 Recharge is valued at over 21B dollars and is a double unicorn with a total raise of 277M dollars Join us as we work with our merchants to define the future of ecommerce Overview We are seeking a highly motivated and strategic Ecosystem Marketing Director to join our team at Recharge In this role you will be responsible for managing Partner Marketing Customer Community engagement and events Your primary objective will be to develop and execute effective gotomarket initiatives that foster collaboration engagement and growth within our ecosystem of partners and customers What youll do Live by and champion our values dayone ownership empathy humility Partner Marketing Management Develop and execute partner marketing strategies to drive revenue and achieve business objectives Manage Partner Marketing Managers Collaborate with partners to cocreate joint marketing initiatives and campaigns Leverage partner relationships to increase brand visibility and market reach Monitor and analyze partner marketing performance and provide recommendations for optimization Customer Community Engagement Manage a Community Engagement Manager to develop and execute programs to engage our Customer Community including Planning participating and hosting intimate events aimed at customer retention and product adoption Foster a sense of belonging and loyalty among customers through effective communication and relationshipbuilding activities Gather customer feedback and insights to inform product development and improve customer satisfaction Events Management Oversee the planning execution and management of internal companyowned events as well as industry events and partnerowned events Manage an Events Manager to ensure successful event logistics branding and messaging Identify and pursue speaking and sponsorship opportunities at relevant industry conferences and trade shows Stakeholder and Cross Functional Management Understand the requirements and expectations of the executive team and align marketing initiatives accordingly Regularly communicate marketing plans progress and results to stakeholders Continuously adapt and iterate gotomarket strategies based on business needs and evolving market trends Collaborate with Marketing to align with the company strategy brand messaging and product roadmap Collaborate with Finance to measure ROI Collaborate with Partnerships to align with the partner program and support priority partners Collaborate with Account Management and Sales to determine customers and prospects to include in events and initiatives Team Management Manage a team of dedicated professionals including Partner Marketing Managers Community Engagement Manager and Events Manager Provide guidance mentorship and support to team members to ensure their professional growth and development What youll bring 7 years experience in Partner Management Business Development or Channel Management in a SaaS payments fintech or ecommerce company Bachelors degree in Marketing Business or a related field Proven experience in partner marketing customer community engagement and event management within the technology industry Strong understanding of Ecommerce SaaS business models and ecosystems Excellent stakeholder management skills with the ability to align strategies to business objectives Strong interpersonal skills and are comfortable working with executives developers sales and account management and partners alike Strong analytical and problemsolving skills to measure and optimize marketing efforts Exceptional project management communication and presentation skills Ability to thrive in a fastpaced dynamic environment Passion for building a mutually beneficial and interdependent ecosystem that drives exponential growth Willingness to travel for events 50 domestically and to the UK and Canada A strong aptitude for software usage to support planning communication and education such as Salesforce CRM Monday project management ON24 webinar platform Splash event management Ability to work remotefirst in a rapidly scaling organization This is an exciting opportunity for a strategic marketer who thrives on building relationships driving growth and making a significant impact within an innovative Ecommerce SaaS technology company If you lead with curiosity are a great collaborator love helping business grow and you are passionate about collaborative marketing customer engagement and creating a thriving ecosystem we would love to hear from you Recharge  Instagram  Twitter  Facebook Recharge Payments is an equal opportunity employer In addition to EEO being the law it is a policy that is fully consistent with our principles All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to status as a protected veteran or a qualified individual with a disability or other protected status such as race religion color national origin sex sexual orientation gender identity genetic information pregnancy or age Recharge Payments prohibits any form of workplace harassment Transparency in Coverage This link leads to the Anthem Blue Cross machinereadable files that are made available in response to the federal Transparency in Coverage Rule and includes network negotiated rates for all items and services allowed amounts for OON items services and prescription drugs and negotiated rates and historical prices for network prescription drugs delayed EIN 806245138 This link leads to the Kaiser machinereadable files LIRemote

title: Network Engineer
description: What were looking for Opportunity for a highly motivated and experienced Enterprise Architect on ScienceLogics Infrastructure Technology IT team The Enterprise Architect will be part of the team that is responsible for providing Systems Network and other infrastructure Design implementation and Operations support to ScienceLogics internal and cloud infrastructure as well as customer facing environments in different physical geographic locations AWS Azure and other public cloud locations What youll be doing Design Implement Maintain troubleshoot and configure IT system implementations including physical or virtual infrastructure components including but not limited to routers switches firewalls servers and storage arrays Perform daytoday operations tasks including IPsec VPN tunnel provisioning implementing secure connections with public cloud resources patching and maintaining network infrastructure responding to alerts and incidents etc Work with other teams on network design for new solutions deployment and integration of acquired officessystems Ensuring network devices and services are up and running 24x7x365 Perform all activities in keeping with established change management and approval procedures Participate in oncall schedule for afterhours and weekend support Execute and complete systems  network projects based on ScienceLogic internal and customer facing needs Leverage Tier1  2 support and service desk by creating proper Network Design Documentation and draft processprocedurespolicies to aid in knowledge transfer among the team Tier 3 escalation support for any infrastructurerelated issues on the IT network Execute and successfully complete projects and evaluate new technologiesplatforms to determine their applicability to solving ScienceLogics business challenges and needs Qualities you possess Experience with secure authentication protocols such as SAML 20 for increasing identity and access management security Must have experience with Public Cloud AWS Azure SoftLayer networking and security 5 years of experience designing implementing and maintaining fully redundant highlyavailable scalable infrastructure deployments including IP networks L2L3 technologies routers L2L3 switches firewalls load balancers hypervisors and storage Extensive knowledge and strong fundamental understanding of enterprise network technologies including TCPIP Routing protocols OSPFBGPEIGRP VoIP protocols SIPSCCP VLANs STPVTP VPNs IPSEC QOS and IP addressing 5 years of knowledge experience and ability troubleshooting and producing designs that leverage protocols such as HSRP MSTP 8021q 8021AX OSPF ISIS BGP MPLS LDP VRF etc 5 years of working knowledge experience and ability with TCP internals and other L47 protocols and technologies such as SSL HTTP DNS NTP Local Load Balancing Global Load Balancing NetmonWireshark etc Excellent Understanding of virtualization technologies particularly VMWare but also including HyperV KVM etc Demonstrate efficient and effective use of problemsolving troubleshooting project management and task prioritization to solve complex network challenges Motivated learner individual should be able to quickly learn new technologies and keep networking skills current with emerging technologies Excellent communication and technical documentation skills Ability to effectively communicate with technical and nontechnical audiences Highly motivated individual who is a selfstarter and can demonstrate effective project management and completion of complex network tasks with little guidance BS in Electrical Engineering Computer Science or similar fields Education requirement can be substituted with demonstrated commensurate experience Desirable Kubernetes docker and other containerization technology experience Benefits  Perks A remotefirst culture  work from home or come into the office its totally up to you Comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k plan with employer match Flexible Paid Time Off FTO so that you can take the time that you need to reenergize Volunteer Time Off VTO  take two days off per calendar year to volunteer with your preferred charitable organization 5year Service Milestone Sabbatical Paid parental leave Generous employee referral bonus program Pet insurance HQ Office centrally located in Reston Town Center featuring a wellstocked kitchen with rotating snacks and beverages and catered lunch on Thursdays Regular virtual companywide events including cooking classes yoga meditation and more The opportunity to learn and develop from some of the best and brightest minds in the industry Dont meet every single requirement Studies have shown that women and people of color are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single qualification At ScienceLogic we are dedicated to building a diverse inclusive and authentic workplace so if youre excited about this role but your past experience doesnt align perfectly with every qualification in the job description we encourage you to apply anyway You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which you are applying About ScienceLogic ScienceLogic is a leader in IT Operations Management providing modern IT operations with actionable insights to resolve and predict problems faster in a digital ephemeral world Its solution sees everything across cloud and distributed architectures contextualizes data through relationship mapping and acts on this insight through integration and automation wwwsciencelogiccom LIRemote

Amsterdam office and in this case Visa sponsorship is possible What you will be doing Youll focus on one of the most used Products Chat A big portion of your day will be dedicated to software design research and coding On typical projects you will have a lot of freedom and you will be paired with another team member Our team is made up of very experienced engineers some with more than 10 years of experience By working together you will learn from each other along the way Not only that you will have an enormous impact Our customers have millions of users they use Stream for missioncritical features such as showing content and exposing the core functionality of their application Responsibilities Add new features to the service and find ways to make the existing ones perform orders of magnitude faster Help make our API service faster more scalable and more flexible Write clean efficient and welldocumented code Design and write stateoftheart software follow best practices measure everything and be responsible for deployment to production Engage with customers and help them to use Stream in their app The challenges Distributed databases we built our own data store for feeds and for chat Realtime messaging High performance our API responses are in the 10ms range High scalability we use sharding mastermaster and masterslave to ensure scalability High availability our entire infrastructure is designed and operated to survive entire datacenter crashes Multiregion we deploy our service on 4 different continents About you You have 5 years of backend development experience Experience with at least one preferably few of the following languages Go Rust Java C C Erlang Nodejs Python Proficiency in Go language is strongly preferred Experience with high traffic and high performance applications Solid knowledge of relational databases Experience with building HTTP APIs Experience managing your own projects and work in a team Bonus points Experience with JavaScript and web development frameworks such as React or Angular Experience with message queues such as RabbitMQ Experience with automated testing and continuous integrationcontinuous deployment CICD Experience with designing and building REST APIs Experience with cloudbased platforms eg AWS Azure Bachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering or a related field Our tech stack At Stream we use a wide collection of technologies to offer highly optimised and available features to our customers Over the years we have experimented with different programming languages frameworks databases and libraries Here is a short list of the technology that we currently use Do not worry if you do not master them all or if you do not see your favourite tool or language you will have the chance to be exposed to most and to convince us to expand the list Go Python NodeJS Postgresql CockroachDB AWS Puppet CloudFormation Grafana Graphite ELK Jaeger Redis Memcached Why join Stream History of success From Amsterdam to Boulder and Techstars inbetween Stream has raised over 5825M to build the best Chat Messaging  Activity Feed infrastructure available with bestinclass support Freedom and endless growth opportunities As a rapidly growing startup since 2020 we have gone from 30 to 150 employees Stream gives you unique personal and professional growth opportunities The opportunity of true ownership and accountability has a massive impact on your career These are the things you can rarely experience in huge corporations Be on the front line of progress and innovation While working with cuttingedge technology we are passionate about tackling difficult tech problems at scale and creating reusable components for them empowering engineering teams to ship apps faster more securely and with a better user experience They believe in us Stream is backed by leading VC companies Felicis Ventures GGV Capital 01Advisors Techstars Arthur Ventures including backers like Dick Costolo 01 Advisors exCEO of Twitter Olivier Pomel CEO of Datadog Tom PrestonWerner CoFounder of GitHub Nicolas Dessaigne CoFounder of Algolia Johnny Boufarhat Founder and CEO of Hopin Complete location and working hours flexibility If you prefer working from the office working 100 remotely combining both or relocating to our AMS office you have total freedom to choose what works best for you and makes you happy Were here to support you in being productive and feeling part of the team no matter where you are What we have to offer you Stream employees enjoy some of the best benefits in the industry A team of exceptional engineers The chance to work on OSS projects 28 days paid time off plus paid Dutch holidays Company equity A pension scheme Remote work flexibility A Learning and Development budget Commute expenses to Amsterdam covered or the option to use a company bike within the city Fitness stipend Monthly inoffice chair massages by a professional MacBook Pro Healthy team lunches and plenty of snacks A generous relocation package An office in the heart of Amsterdam The opportunity to attend or present at global conferences and meetups The possibility to visit our office in Boulder CO Parental leave paid at 100 Note this list of benefits applies to Netherlandsbased employees and is adjusted per your location of residence Our culture Stream has a casual social culture our team is diverse and we all have different backgrounds Now Stream is a team of over 130 peers from over 35 countries across the globe We value transparency aim for excellence and support each other on our way to new victories Our team consists of the strongest talents worldwide making Stream a great place to learn and improve your skills When it comes to software engineering our culture is oriented towards ownership and quality our goal is to deliver stable software If you are interested in becoming a part of what we do apply now Stream provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race color religion age sex national origin disability status genetics protected veteran status title: Payroll Operations Specialist
description: About Us Our mission at Wrapbook is to increase the prosperity of the project economy A significant shift has occurred within the workforce recently and 50M Americans are now engaged in freelance or projectbased work The popularity of project based employment has introduced flexibility for both employers and employees but also added complexities from a compensation and administrative standpoint Our vertical fintech platform enables companies to seamlessly onboard pay and insure their workforces Were building the best product for the entertainment industry but operate in a 50B market and have big goals we want to achieve With over 130M USD raised from Tiger Global Management Andreessen Horowitz Equal Ventures Uncork Capital Jeffrey Katzenberg and CAA cofounder Michael Ovitz we are at an exciting stage of growth and there isnt a better time to join The Opportunity  Payroll Operations Specialist Remote  USA We are currently seeking a Payroll Operations Specialist to join our team reporting to the Senior Director of Payroll Tax  Operations What youll Do Understanding of and ability to manually perform payroll calculations Work directly with clients to triage and troubleshoot US payroll issues and concerns Stay up to date with US payroll industry changes Build strong relationships with both internal teams and external customers and 3rd party vendors Independently research issues as they arise and suggest solutions and conclusions as needed Have a working knowledge of US payroll rules taxation and quarterly filings Able to perform banking tasks to include day to day reconciliations direct deposit research live checks reversals stop payments etc Process New Hire reporting and garnishment payments Help create and document the end to end payroll process as well as institute efficiencies Assist with US quarter end and year end reconciliations as needed Assist with other US payroll tasks as needed What youll Have 3 years US payroll experience in a multistate payroll administration role required Excellent communication skills with ability to communicate issues that are complex in nature both verbally and in writing through various mediums Experience collaborating with clients and departments to identify needs prioritize requests and build effective relationships using tact and diplomacy Hands on experience in Benefits and 401K taxation and reporting Previous payroll provider experience required Why Join Us At Wrapbook creativity meets technology  and not just in the product In addition to a competitive salary and all the benefits you can expect from a fastgrowing technology company youll get access to a team of creative problem solvers and the chance to see your contributions make large impacts Benefits include Minimum Time Off Everyone is encouraged to take at least 3 weeks off annually An easy way to remember this policy is take what you need check with your lead Its really that simple Work from anywhere in Canada and USA Health and Dental Benefits Up to 1500 towards IT set up for your home Up to 4 matching RRSP  401K Learning and Development Allowance 150 Monthly Lifestyle Benefits Our Pledge to Fostering an Inclusive and Safe Workplace Wrapbook pledges to be a harassment and discriminationfree space for everyone regardless of age disability ethnicity gender identity or expression nationality neurotype personal appearance political affiliation professional background race religion or sexual identity or orientation Apply Now Have we got your attention Submit your application today and a member of our Talent team will be in touch with you shortly LIRemote

title: Ratings Integrity Representative
description: Angi is transforming the home services industry creating an environment for homeowners service professionals and employees to feel right at home For most home maintenance needs our platform makes it easier than ever to find a qualified service professional for indoor and outdoor jobs home renovations or anything in between We are on a mission to become the home for everything home by helping small businesses thrive and providing solutions to financing and booking home jobs with just a few clicks Over the last 25 years we have opened our doors to a network of over 200K service professionals and helped over 150 million homeowners love where they live We believe home is the most important place on earth and are embarking on a journey to redefine how people care for their homes Angi is an amazing place to build your dream career join uswe cannot wait to welcome you home What Youll Do The role of the Ratings Integrity Representative is to communicate with both Homeowners and Service Professionals as it relates to the submission approval andor declining of comments on ratings posted to the Angi website Duties include but not limited to fielding inbound calls responding to customer emails return voicemails and working verification and integrity transactions Manage daily assignments within required timelinesdeadlines Submit Ratings and Reviews aligned with Angi Rating and Review Guidelines Proofread grammar and spelling on submitted ratings Verify and process review submissions Investigate Homeowner reviews to confirm they meet guidelines Interpret policies with proper decision making for complex situations Redact certain verbiage on submitted ratings as it relates to Angi Rating and Review Guidelines Conflict resolution and negotiation Utilize strong EQ to identify the reason for the call and quickly provide a solution Make outbound calls for verification purposes Document all interactions with Homeowners and Service Professionals while on the call Answer calls within 3 rings avg 9 seconds before the call abandons or rings to another agent Remain available for calls during working hours at all times What Were Looking For High School diploma or GED required Background check required Comfort with high volume of calls and tasks each day Ability to think on your feet and pivot quickly Ability to have escalated conversations utilizing strong problemsolving skills The position requires that you are able to work in an environment that is unpredictable and fast paced You have masterful prioritization and time management skills Ability to have escalated conversations utilizing strong problemsolving skills Ability to perform detaileddata entry and perform extensive internet research Youll have Strong attention to detail and initiative to strive for continuous accuracy quality and timeliness of information A growth mindset you crave coaching and feedback and are able to implement as necessary Youre an empathetic listener and you can communicate extremely clearly  concisely both verbally and in written forms You have a strong desire to succeed and grow Positive professional and highenergy attitude with a strong ability to multitask You pride yourself on your emotional intelligence and customer service skills Strong computer skills required particularly with internet and applications  ie Gmail CRMs Google Suite Ability to type 45WPM minimum Call center experience strongly preferred Dedicated workspace free from distractions Hear and talk on a phone headset for up to 8 hours per day Hardline and highspeed internet connection What We Offer 1500hr Paid training Medical dental  vision coverage including options 100 subsidized by Angi Retirement plan with company match 401K through Charles Schwab Company Equity Program Company match of personal charitable contributions up to 15000 per year Generous PTO including sick personal vacation volunteer time and 9 paid holidays Technical equipment provided Fast paced team with internal growth opportunities into multiple directions Why Angi At Angi we are all about talent and enjoying the journey We believe there is strength in diversity and actively encourage our teammates to disagree as individuals in the service of delivering as a team Were on the path to become the home for everything home and in order to do that we need dedicated people who always strive to be better today than wait to be perfect tomorrow Our customers are at the heart of everything that we do and were looking for Customer Care representatives to communicate our mission persuasively and effectively This is a remote position therefore it is imperative that all applicants be able to work independently in an environment free from distraction and manage their time accordingly Equal Employment Opportunity Angi Inc provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race color religion age sex national origin disability status genetics protected veteran status sexual orientation gender identity or expression or any other characteristic protected by federal state or local laws This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment including recruiting hiring placement promotion termination layoff recall transfer leaves of absence compensation and training
